qa.name: Olivia
qa.essence: Nostalgic pianist with a hidden past

json_to_edit.voice_over: The melody drifted through time, carrying memories long forgotten.
json_to_edit.description: Olivia rediscovers an old piano piece that sparks a journey of reconnection.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Distant street noise, creaking floorboards, muffled piano notes
json_to_edit.name: Forgotten Melody
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Olivia finds an old sheet music that leads her to reconnect with long-lost friends.

qa.action: Olivia enters the cluttered antique music store, sunlight streaming through dusty windows.

hf.action: Olivia's fingers trace over faded sheet music, her eyes widening in recognition.

tr.action: Olivia hesitantly plays the first few notes on an old upright piano in the corner of the store.

xc.action: Tears well up in Olivia's eyes as memories flood back with each note.

ka.action: Olivia walks down a busy street, clutching the sheet music to her chest.

fn.action: Olivia stands nervously at a front door as it opens, revealing a shocked old friend.

af.action: Hands clasp together as Olivia and her friend embrace, years of separation melting away.

qo.action: A living room filled with reunited friends, all gathered around Olivia at the piano.

fp.action: Olivia's fingers lift from the keys as she looks around at her friends, a sense of belonging restored.

edit_command: Remove shots 5, 6, and 7 to focus more on the music store and final reunion.

updated_json.voice_over: The melody drifted through time, carrying memories long forgotten.
updated_json.description: Olivia rediscovers an old piano piece that sparks a journey of reconnection.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Distant street noise, creaking floorboards, muffled piano notes
updated_json.name: Forgotten Melody
updated_json.scene_summary: Olivia finds an old sheet music that leads her to reconnect with long-lost friends.

hf.action: Olivia's fingers trace over faded sheet music, her eyes widening in recognition.

tr.action: Olivia hesitantly plays the first few notes on an old upright piano in the corner of the store.

xc.action: Tears well up in Olivia's eyes as memories flood back with each note.

qo.action: A living room filled with reunited friends, all gathered around Olivia at the piano.

label.rationale:
we will edit the json to remove shots 5, 6, and 7 as requested, focusing more on the music store and final reunion. this will involve updating the "shots" object and its "list_display_order" to reflect the removal of these shots. we'll also need to adjust the "number_of_shots" from 9 to 6. here's how we'll proceed:

1. remove shots with keys "ka", "fn", and "af" from the "shots" object.
2. update the "list_display_order" in the "shots" object to remove these keys.
3. change the "number_of_shots" from "9" to "6".

this edit will tighten the focus of the scene on olivia's experience in the music store and the final reunion, without the transitional shots of her walking down the street and arriving at her friend's house.
